main event: On 30 January 1949, a bright green fireball was observed over El Paso, Texas, by multiple witnesses including military personnel.
interesting points: The object was described as resembling a burning ball,Approximately 100 eyewitness accounts were reported within hours of the sighting,Some observers noted a sound similar to a racing motorcycle,The object's trajectory was mostly horizontal before it fizzled out, and its color changed from blue-green to various shades during the descent.
witness description: military personnel and civilians near El Paso and surrounding areas.
